long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record end-to-end interactions with your web applications using SimpleTest, and store the resulting actions as plain English-based tests in the cloud. SimpleTest effortlessly executes these recorded actions as tests across various browser or OS configurations available in the cloud.

Easy to Understand: All interactions are saved as plain English statements, making them easy for anyone to understand.

Speedy Test Development: Recording and running tests takes only a few minutes.

No Setup Cost: Sign up, add the SimpleTest Recorder, and begin testing in no time. Itâ€™s that simple!

Easy Maintenance: If your UI changes, you can quickly record new interactions, update existing test steps, and continue automation testing without disruptions.


Features in SimpleTest Recorder?

==  REST API steps are seamlessly supported during recording.
==  XPath expressions are used to locate dynamic elements with changing attributes, with enhanced strategies to capture more accurate XPaths during recording.
==  Move or minimize the recorder anywhere on the screen, giving you full control over its placement without forced docking.
==  Inline element path viewer: Hover over any element in your application, and SimpleTest identifies the element, ensuring stability in repeated executions.
==  Naming conventions for elements and screens reflect what you see on the UI.
==  Easily edit or delete any element directly from the recorder.
